member.name: T:CounterStrike2GSI.CS2GSIFile
member.summary: Class handling Game State Integration configuration file generation.

member.name: M:CounterStrike2GSI.CS2GSIFile.CreateFile(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Attempts to create a Game State Integration configuraion file.
The configuration will target http://localhost:{port}/ address.
Returns true on success, false otherwise.
member.returns: Returns true on success, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CounterStrike2GSI.CS2GSIFile.CreateFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Attempts to create a Game State Integration configuraion file.
The configuration will target the specified URI address.
Returns true on success, false otherwise.
member.returns: Returns true on success, false otherwise.

member.name: E:CounterStrike2GSI.EventsInterface`1.GameEvent
member.summary: Event for handing Counter-Strike 2 game events.

member.name: T:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState
member.summary: A class representing various information pertaining to Game State Integration of Counter-Strike 2.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.Auth
member.summary:
Information about GSI authentication.
Enabled by including "auth" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.Provider
member.summary:
Information about the provider of this GameState.
Enabled by including "provider" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.Map
member.summary:
Information about the current map.
Enabled by including "map" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.Round
member.summary:
Information about the current round.
Enabled by including "round" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.Player
member.summary:
Information about the local player or team players when spectating.
Enabled by including any of the following in the game state cfg file: "player_id" "1"
"player_state" "1"
"player_match_stats" "1"
"player_weapons" "1"
"player_position" "1"

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.PhaseCountdowns
member.summary:
Information about the phase countdowns. (SPECTATOR ONLY)
Enabled by including "phase_countdowns" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.AllPlayers
member.summary:
Information about the all players in the game. (SPECTATOR ONLY)
Enabled by including any of the following in the game state cfg file: "allplayers_id" "1"
"allplayers_state" "1"
"allplayers_match_stats" "1"
"allplayers_weapons" "1"
"allplayers_position" "1"

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.AllGrenades
member.summary:
Information about the all grenades in the game. (SPECTATOR ONLY)
Enabled by including "allgrenades" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.Bomb
member.summary:
Information about the bomb in the game. (SPECTATOR ONLY)
Enabled by including "bomb" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: F:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.TournamentDraft
member.summary:
Information about the tournament draft in the game. (SPECTATOR ONLY)
Enabled by including "tournamentdraft" "1" in the game state cfg file.

member.name: M:CounterStrike2GSI.GameState.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Creates a GameState instance based on the given json data.

member.summary: Delegate for handing new game state changes.

member.summary: Gets the URI that is being listened.

member.summary: Returns whether or not the listener is running.

member.summary: Event for handing a newly received game state.

member.summary: A GameStateListener that listens for connections to the specified URI.

member.returns: Returns true on success, false otherwise.

member.summary: Stops the listener and frees up resources.
